scripts.versions: npm run -s spago-version & npm run -s esbuild-version & npm run -s purs-version & npm run -s psa-version & npm run -s purs-tidy-version
scripts.example-all: npm run -s example-b4-unload-event & npm run -s example-basic & npm run -s example-dialog
scripts.example-b4-unload-event: spago bundle -p b4-unload-event --bundle-type app --outfile dist/index.js && cp examples/b4-unload-event/html/index.html examples/b4-unload-event/dist/
scripts.example-basic: spago bundle -p basic --bundle-type app --outfile dist/index.js && cp examples/basic/html/index.html examples/basic/dist/
scripts.example-dialog: spago bundle -p dialog --bundle-type app --outfile dist/index.js && cp examples/dialog/html/index.html examples/dialog/dist/
